dct_description_sm: Latitudinal and longitudinal lines along margins; linear parallels and climate indicated on right side.
Shows topography, waterways, and possibly route.
From Geographia di Francesco Berlinghieri Fiorentino in terza rima ... (first edition of Ptolemy in Italian), Florence: Nicolò Todescho, 1482.
